// Structure of Database:
//
// RACE,MobID1,MobID2,MobID3,MobID4,MobID5,MobID6,MobID7,MobID8,MobID9

1,1122,1123,1124,1125,1126,1245,1258,1280,1308,1392,1534,1535,1536,1537,1538,1557,1577,1607	// Goblins
2,1133,1134,1135,1136,1137,1226,1282,1455,1545,1546,1547	// Kobolds
3,1023,1152,1153,1177,1189,1213,1222,1223,1235,1273,1439,1452,1462,1463,1473,1588,1686		// Orcs
4,1040,1278,1366,1497,1540,1549				// Golems
5,1285,1286,1287				// Guardians
